name: Wet Land
description:
This was a small project I made over the span of about two weeks, I was inspired by Rain World and Pico Park and decided to make a platformer themed prototype out of it. This isn't a game, however if people like this idea I will expand on the initial concept.
Oh I should probably mention this is just a fangame, none of this is unique.

Gameplay;
Eat blue fruit and batflies, do a few jumps, become one with the scug.
